Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. With its high-quality features and exceptional performance, it's truly a game-changer in its category. Considering its value and the benefits it offers, I propose a price of $200 for this product. I believe this price reflects not only the cost of production but also the immense value it brings to you. Let me know if you have any questions or if you're interested in making a purchase. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $200. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $200
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $80
